### Map of Manila with markers to highlight Sta Mesa and Sta Ana Manila

```{r}
#install.packages("leaflet")
library(leaflet)

#Sta Ana and Sta Mesa Manila
df <- data.frame(lat = c(14.582636, 14.600891), lng = c(121.013441,121.01033))

#Sta Ana, Manila and Sta Mesa, Manila
df %>%
        leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers()
```
